name: arch::cpu::context::FpuContext::new

spin::once::Once::<T, R>::get.doc: Returns a reference to the inner value if the [`Once`] has been initialized.

alloc::boxed::Box::<T>::new.doc:
Allocates memory on the heap and then places `x` into it.

 This doesn't actually allocate if `T` is zero-sized.

 # Examples

 ```
 let five = Box::new(5);
 ```

core::option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 517, kind: RigidTy(Ref(Region { kind: ReErased }, Ty { id: 11, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) }, Not)) })])
